meanings.definition: To change the appearance of something by applying a new skin or covering.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys reskinning her phone with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: The game developer is reskinning the characters to give them a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: After reskinning her laptop, it looked like a brand new device.
meanings.sent4: The artist reskinning the mural transformed the entire street.
meanings.sent5: Reskinning the old furniture breathed new life into the room.

meanings.definition: The act of updating or refreshing the visual design of a product or application.
meanings.sent1: The reskinning of the website made it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The reskinning of the app attracted more users with its modern look.
meanings.sent3: The reskinning of the logo gave the company a fresh identity.
meanings.sent4: The reskinning of the store front drew in more customers.
meanings.sent5: The reskinning of the game interface improved player engagement.
